byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The new fund comes as start-ups continue to raise money, sometimes at jaw-dropping valuations, leading to some worries about overheated enthusiasm.

headline.main: Menlo Ventures to Announce It Has Raised $400 Million for Latest Fund

snippet: The new fund comes as start-ups continue to raise money, sometimes at jaw-dropping valuations, leading to some worries about overheated enthusiasm.
